Trade/Device Name(s): Nova Max One Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Nova Max One Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Nova Max One Blood Glucose Monitor
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Nova Max One Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement in fresh capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: For self-testing by individuals with diabetes mellitus to quantitatively measure glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip or forearm; intended for single-patient home use and not for diagnosis, screening, neonatal use, or multi-patient use.
